version_description:
·Reorder past meals in seconds using the new Rapid Reorder tab.
·Shortcuts to call, get directions to, and view the ordering hours of every restaurant.
·Improved support for new iPhone and iPod Touch displays.
·Lots of usability improvements and a new look.
iOS 9, improved location search flow; active map pins, driving directions enabled, search results in list form, overall app functionality improvements.
iOS 9, improved location search flow; active map pins, driving directions enabled, search results in list form, overall app functionality improvements.

Added support for new MasterCard BIN range
Added support for new MasterCard BIN range

- added caloric information to menu
- nutritional statements have been added to menu pages
- reset password issues for existing account holders
- added ability to force app upgrades
- bug fixes and other enhancements

- New and improved design for easier navigation
- Quick reorder feature allows you to order your favorites in just a few taps
- Introduced ability to schedule orders for later or pick it up right away
- Enhanced menu for improved ordering experience
- Improved location finder making it easy to find your closest Zaxby’s
